hints.0: There Arno hints needed for this card.
Have you spotted the hidden number?
hints.1: The hose is in the shape of a 9.

hints.0: Which dog is that? You get three guesses.
If singing isn't helping, try saying it clearly.
Each clue refers to a different location on the map. Click them in order
hints.1: Click the turkey leg, David, the heliocentric model of the solar system, then the Uffizi gallery
hints.2: You should see the number 4. Take that card.

hints.0: A four day work week? Utopia! Add the missing day to this card.
One experienced dog is able to retrieve a floating orange ball every time.
hints.1: Use Harper to retrieve the ball. Then tell her she's a great girl and will be loved forever and ever.

hints.0: It isn't a Spanish boy whose name has been mispronounced, it's a tube that liquids and gases can flow through.
hints.1: Add it to the goggles because I don't really understasnd how scuba diving works.

hints.0: Sorry about this pointless card.
hints.1: To make it up to you, let me tell you a story.
hints.2: Once there was a little monkey who wanted to play with the horse.
hints.3: The horse was willing, but knew he would run too fast for the monkey
hints.4: But the monkey insisted on playing anyway. She was a brave but naive monkey.
hints.5: The horse mistook her desire for bravery, and fell in love with her.
hints.6: To keep his love safe, the horse ran gently, so that his owners felt they could put him in smaller and smaller fields.
hints.7: The horse gave up his freedom, and became restless, irascible, and deeply unhappy.
hints.8: The monkey thought the horse no longer loved her. But in truth, the horse no longer loved himself.
hints.9: The horse didn't have the bravery either. HE could not turn himself into glue, and stick to the monkey. So he left.
hints.10: The monkey learned two new emotions, which guided her through her own poorly chosen future riding partners.
hints.11: Life is pain. That's why we scream when we give birth.

hints.0: If they can keep out light, I am sure they can keep out water.
Pay attention to the pink square, and Becky's phrasing.
I know it's a stretch, but check out the name of the boat.
Martin has a pond, but did you know about Lewis Island in Scotland?
I am SO sorry about the text on this one. I am not sure what came over me.
No hidden numbers, don't worry. It isn't mint to be useful until later.
Only rated for still bodies of water.
I can only apologise for the tornado she has undoubtedly unleashed today.
Look, I know it shouldn't be necessary. But play along, please.
Probably just ground pepper, no need to be salty about it.
She may be spayed but I'm certain she'd bring a buoy home if you let her.
Of course this makes no sense at all. A calendog? A canindar? Just accept that it is Christmas magic.
If she brings a buoy home, you are losing way more than a minute.
The key is in a box. You just need a sign to open it.
hints.1: The vision showed you where to look for the code.

hints.0: She loves the hose, and will often try to tiurn it on by barking at it.
Why would you try to cover up some of that beautiful face?
We can suspend physics for this most special day.

34.name: Underwater box

hints.0: Needing to give someone a ring? Try someone in Italy
hints.1: It's on the shop front. Watch the vision carefully.

34.answer: The mechanism engages, and reveals a key. Take card 53

hints.0: Harper is standoffish, but is very swiminish.
I like to think that the owner threw their keys away because they wanted no excuse to leave the Christmas celebrations.
I thin Harper would never speak to you again if you tried that.
At the moment, Thursday does not know she can swim.

42.name: Getting home

hints.0: Time and space! Like a day and a huge extra-terrestrial event.

42.solved: She uses the chaotic energy of Thursday and Nova playing to provide enough energy to send you home. Take card 89

hints.0: If Thursday could fly, she still wouldn't. She is probably afraid of clouds.
I think Harper would be a great choice for the first scuba diving border collie.
What's the matter? Have you never seen river pirates before? Singing river shanties and standing on their riverlegs?
I can't be racist! My dog is black!
Pay attention to the pink circle, and the way this guy lied to you!
If you have this before you know what it's for, you must have played before. Stop trying to break it, you'll succeed!
Read the first word of each line, and listen to Polly.
Novi dan in Croation means new day. Ahoy!
Thursday would be a terrible driver, she is so afraid of cars.
There is a pattern to follow, and symbols you have seen before.
hints.1: Triangle means follow the direction, circle means do the opposite, and square is return.

hints.0: I'd get so googley-eyed at that goggley-eyed dog.
Triangle means follow the direction of the statue.
Circle means do not the direction of the statue.
Square means return (go back).
Triangle means follow the direction of the statue.
Circle means do not the direction of the statue.
Triangle means follow the direction of the statue.
Square means return (go back).
Circle means do not the direction of the statue, but nicely.
She would probably reconstruct a better version. Either way, a minute has passed.

hints.0: Circle means do not the direction of the statue, but nicely.

96.name: Driving
96.answer:: You make it all the way to the shop from your vision. Take card...

hints.0: Look through the revealed cards for symbols.
hints.1: Triangles mean follow directions, circles mean lies, squares mean return.

hints.0: Got to find the right combination, like Goldilocks.
It takes 9 months or so to get the perfect little turkey.
We're going to have a baby!
We could have told you months ago, but I hope this reveal was worth it.
To be honest, if it was news to you, then I am impressed Cheermy has managed to keep it from you.
Can you believe it? A baby!
I suppose all animals do it in one way or another. I hope they grow up as cool as their aunts and uncles.
There's a hidden number here, representing that this baby is now the answer to life, the universe, and everything.
hints.1: The number 42 will take you forwards.

hints.0: Thank you all so fucking much for playing. This one has been a real labour of love, pun accurate and intended.
hints.1: I hope you'll excuse me if there won't be one next year, but feel free to play with our little one instead. I am sure they will be even more challenging.
